    C

    calculateEasterSunday(int) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.easter.EasterCalculator
    Returns the date of Easter Sunday for the given year.
    calculateEasterSundayForMonthDayAfter(Month, int, LocalDate) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.easter.EasterCalculator
    Finds the next date for Easter Sunday that falls on the given month and day after the given date.
    calculateEasterSundayForMonthDayAfter(Month, int, LocalDate, int) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.easter.EasterCalculator
    Finds multiple dates for Easter Sunday that fall on the given month and day after the given date.

    D

    DateAfter4099Exception() - Constructor for exception class dev.bjdelacruz.easter.EasterCalculator.DateAfter4099Exception
    Constructs a new exception that should be thrown if a date comes after 4099 AD.
    DateBefore1583Exception() - Constructor for exception class dev.bjdelacruz.easter.EasterCalculator.DateBefore1583Exception
    Constructs a new exception that should be thrown if a date comes before 1583 AD.
    dev.bjdelacruz.easter - package dev.bjdelacruz.easter
    Contains methods for calculating the date for Easter Sunday.

    E

    eastercalculator - module eastercalculator
    This module contains the EasterCalculator class, which is used to calculate the date of Easter Sunday for a particular year.
    EasterCalculator - Class in dev.bjdelacruz.easter
    This class contains methods for calculating the date for Easter Sunday after 1582 AD and before 4100 AD.
    EasterCalculator.DateAfter4099Exception - Exception Class in dev.bjdelacruz.easter
    This exception should be thrown if a date comes after 4099 AD.
    EasterCalculator.DateBefore1583Exception - Exception Class in dev.bjdelacruz.easter
    This exception should be thrown if a date comes before 1583 AD.
    EasterCalculator.InvalidDateForEasterSundayException - Exception Class in dev.bjdelacruz.easter
    This exception should be thrown if a date that will be used to calculate the date for Easter Sunday is invalid.

    G

    getPossibleEasterSundayDates(int) - Static method in class dev.bjdelacruz.easter.EasterCalculator
    Returns a list of dates starting from March 22 of the given year to April 25 of the same year.
